definition.name: Set_Action
definition.definition: For a permutation σ ∈ Sym(Ω) and a subset S ⊆ Ω, the image of S under σ is defined as σ(S) := {σ(x) : x ∈ S}. This defines a group action of Sym(Ω) on the power set P(Ω). Properties: (1) id(S) = S for the identity permutation; (2) (στ)(S) = σ(τ(S)) for composition; (3) |σ(S)| = |S| since σ is a bijection.
